snippet: A reader writes that being alone is not “selfishness,” and another says women need to be able to deflect unwanted attention....
lead_paragraph: A reader writes that being alone is not “selfishness,” and another says women need to be able to deflect unwanted attention.

headline.print_headline: So You’d Rather Be Alone? It’s O.K. Really.
headline.main: So You’d Rather Be Alone? It’s O.K. Really.
